name: Archie Sharma
classification_reason: Archie Sharma is COO of GTM at Zencoder, a B2B AI company likely in the 50-1,500 employee range given their growth stage and industry presence. His role spans cross-functional GTM operations including sales, marketing, and customer success - functions directly impacted by support ticket chaos. His profile shows strong operational leadership experience with patents demonstrating process optimization expertise (40% efficiency improvements). He has managed teams and led strategic initiatives involving customer-facing operations, and his current role requires overseeing operational processes where ticket resolution, knowledge management, and team efficiency would be critical pain points. His background in scaling operations and cross-functional collaboration indicates he faces the operational chaos described in the target ICP.

talking_points: 18+ years of technology executive experience and leadership in GTM strategy
Expertise in cross-functional collaboration between Product, Marketing, Sales, and CSO teams
Background in AI/ML and technology innovation, including patents in predictive modeling and signal processing
Experience with new market entry, product launches, and vertical expansion strategies
Published thought leadership on CTV environments, ad-tech, and strategic execution
Recognition as CRN 2023 Channel Chief and involvement with industry groups like IAB Tech Lab
pain_points: Managing fragmented CTV/ad-tech environments and integrating disparate systems
Balancing subscription vs. ad-supported business models in evolving markets
Ensuring cross-functional alignment and execution across GTM teams
Staying competitive in rapidly changing AI/technology landscape
Optimizing operational efficiency and preventing system/data failures (as evidenced by patent work)
Scaling business while maintaining innovation and market relevance
analysis.outreach_approach: Start with a value-driven email referencing their specific expertise and publications, focusing on how your solution addresses CTV fragmentation, cross-functional GTM challenges, or AI orchestration. Position as a strategic partnership opportunity rather than a sales pitch. Follow up with LinkedIn connection request and personalized message referencing shared industry connections or their recent activity.
personalization: Reference their specific articles on CTV fragmentation or ad-tech exits
Mention their patent work on predictive modeling and operational efficiency
Note their role as CRN 2023 Channel Chief and GTM leadership experience
Connect to their volunteer work with UCLA Anderson AMR program judging
Reference their focus on cross-functional collaboration and strategic execution
Acknowledge their recent engagement with AI/ML content and Zencoder updates

*   ### [Disk drive determining touchdown threshold](https://patents.google.com/patent/US9053740B1/en?trk=public_profile_patent-title "Disk drive determining touchdown threshold")
    
    #### Issued June 9, 2015 US 9053740
    
    Using predictive modeling and signal processing, we were able to dynamically determine disk drive head touch down threshold preventing it from crashing into the media. From an operational efficiency standpoint, the patent method improved efficiency of process by over 40% and avoided hard drive heads to crash onto the media/loss of digital data.

classification_reason: Darren Hall is Chief Operating Officer at Carpenters Group, a legal/insurance services company likely within the 50-1,500 employee range given his senior role and company presence. As COO, he has direct decision-making authority over operational processes and tools. His profile shows strong operational focus with recommendations highlighting his expertise in 'Facilities/Operations Management,' delivering projects 'professionally and to strict deadlines,' and supporting 'IT and Operational issues.' The company's FNOL (First Notification of Loss) service mentioned in his activity involves 24/7 support operations with potential ticket handling challenges. His role overseeing operations in a service-based legal/insurance environment inherently deals with operational chaos in support processes, team management, and process optimization.

talking_points: Experienced COO/Board Director with demonstrated history across multiple industries

Interest in operational efficiency, team development, and career progression

Network of 500+ connections and 30K followers indicating strong industry presence

Balancing team flexibility with operational control requirements
Cybersecurity awareness and protection for distributed workforce
Meeting strict project deadlines while supporting team operational issues
Scaling operations while maintaining service excellence standards
analysis.outreach_approach: Start with a value-driven email referencing his recent industry engagement and operational leadership role. Follow up with a LinkedIn connection request referencing mutual industry interests.
personalization: Reference his recent attendance at I Love Claims Motor Conference 2025
Mention Carpenters Group's 24/7 FNOL service operations
Connect to his interest in cybersecurity awareness initiatives
Note his background in facilities/operations management and project delivery
Reference his location in Pickmere, England
Connect to his demonstrated commitment to team development and career progression

name: David H.
classification_reason: Strong signals found: As COO of Vallarta Supermarkets (grocery chain with likely 1,000+ employees), David has direct operational authority over support/IT functions. His profile shows deep operational focus with projects like 'Operational Excellence Platform' and 'World Great Operator' platform creation, indicating process improvement expertise. He manages large teams (30K followers, 500+ connections) and has board positions (FMI, WAFC) demonstrating decision-making authority. The grocery retail industry has significant support operations for stores, distribution centers, and customer service. His background in operational excellence and process improvement platforms directly aligns with resolving operational chaos in support/request handling systems.

talking_points: Operational excellence and efficiency improvements
Leadership development and team building
Innovation in retail operations and technology
Supply chain and distribution optimization
Industry recognition and awards (IFPA Mango Retailer of the Year 2025)
International experience across multiple continents
Board positions with FMI and WAFC industry associations
pain_points: Managing operational complexity across multiple store locations
Supply chain and distribution challenges for perishable goods
Developing and retaining leadership talent
Maintaining competitive advantage in retail grocery
Implementing technology solutions that improve efficiency
Balancing operational excellence with customer experience
Managing costs while maintaining quality standards
analysis.outreach_approach: Start with a warm, professional email acknowledging their industry leadership and recent achievements. Focus on how your SaaS solution can support their operational excellence initiatives and leadership development goals. Reference their specific projects and industry involvement to demonstrate genuine understanding of their role and challenges.
personalization: Mention their recent IFPA Mango Retailer of the Year 2025 award
Reference their Operational Excellence Platform (OEP) project
Acknowledge their board positions with FMI and WAFC
Note their long-term commitment to mentoring and leadership development
Connect to their international operational experience
Reference their Harvard Business School background
Mention their recent IFPA Global Tour hosting at Vallarta facilities

name: Eduardo J. Dominguez, Shrm-scp, Cbi, Maami
classification_reason: As COO of ShiftPixy, Eduardo Dominguez has direct operational authority over support/service teams managing workforce solutions for clients. His SHRM-SCP and CBI certifications indicate deep expertise in human resources and organizational management, directly relevant to addressing agent turnover challenges. ShiftPixy's business model (staffing/HR technology) inherently involves managing service operations, ticket handling, and customer support workflows for their client base. ## About

OVERVIEW:  
Maximizing business technology.  
  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:  
Accomplished IT leader with over 30 years of extensive experience in managing and improving business  
IT departments and operations. Proven expertise in developing and refining technology solutions,  
building and maintaining infrastructure, networks, servers, data centers, websites, cloud systems, and  
custom software programming. Known for staying current with modern technology solutions. My  
technology experience will give your business a competitive edge.  
  
CORE COMPETENCIES:  
• Technology Education  
• Strategic Technology Thinking  
• Simplified Technology Communication  
• IT Team Hiring, Training, Management  
• IT Planning, Budgeting, Implementation, & Project Management  
• Client Relations  
• Data Security, Cybersecurity Training  
• Web Development, SEO, PPC, SMM  
• Programming  
• Business Computing Hardware & Software  
• Cloud IT Infrastructure Management  
  
To schedule a speaking engagement, training seminar, or to discuss ways I can help improve your business technologies please call (602) 456-0150 or email andre@mypctechs.com.

## About

During my career I have managed different and diverse industries for more than 30 years, dealing and negotiating with a full diverse range of clientele, including quality managers, directors, professional entities and owners of small to very large concern. I am proficient in report writing, analysing risks and presenting suitable recommendations.  
  
In addition to a B.Sc Biochemistry, Physiology qualification, obtained from the University of Stellenbosch, I was fortunate to obtain certificates in Business Management, Sales and Marketing Management, Budget Control & Budget Management, Manager Development (qualified as an Instructor) and Industrial Relations (qualified as an Instructor), amongst other, during my career.  
  
Although an analyst of nature, I am a positive person who seems to have the ability to lead, coach, correct and motivate my subordinates. I am assertive, expect discipline, just and fairness from my team. I know I have earned the respect of my colleagues and my clients as some have personally indicated this to me.

classification_reason: David Manshoory is a Co-Founder/COO at Alleyoop, which appears to be a consumer beauty/e-commerce company based on the LinkedIn activity mentions of rebranding, ROAS metrics, and beauty industry context. The profile shows no signals of managing support operations, IT teams, customer success, or service desks. His experience focuses on entrepreneurship, scaling companies, and operational leadership in consumer-facing businesses rather than the ticket/support workflow challenges ResolveOnce targets. While he has decision-making authority as COO, there's no evidence he deals with the specific pain points of incomplete ticket closures, agent turnover, or ticket bouncing in support/IT operations. The company context also doesn't align with B2B/SaaS environments with heavy support operations.

## About

CEO of BlitzMetrics, a digital marketing company which partners with schools to train young adults. We offer courses, implementation, and consulting.  
  
My personal mission centers around mentorship from my experience with helping people from all walks of life grow their expertise in digital marketing, sharing his insights from managing campaigns for enterprise clients like The Golden State Warriors, Nike, and Rosetta Stone.  
  
I help digital agencies grow, serving doctors and real estate agents as fractional CTO.  
  
I'm an internationally recognized lecturer in digital marketing and have spoken over 730 times in 17 countries, spanning 5 continents.  
  
Featured in: The Wall Street Journal, New York Times, LA Times, National Public Radio, TechCrunch, Fox News, CNN, CBS Evening News and co-authored “Facebook Nation” – a textbook taught in over 700 colleges and universities.

## About

I am a COO with over 14 years of experience in the IT industry, leading and growing online platforms that offer cutting-edge learning and development solutions in AI, cloud, data science, and .NET skills. I have an Executive Sales and Marketing from IIM Kozhikode, a MCA from Rajasthan Technical University, and a CDCW certification from Henry Harvin.  
  
Currently, I am the COO at TheScholarHat, a platform that helps tech professionals upskill in the latest technologies and connects them with top tech companies for talent acquisition. I use AI to improve marketing, business strategy, and team development, creating data-driven campaigns, developing innovative strategies, and providing AI-powered workshops. I also oversee all areas of operations, collaborating with cross-functional teams to launch and market new products and services, implementing processes to increase efficiency and revenue, and building a high-performing team and culture. I am passionate about empowering individuals and organizations to succeed in the rapidly changing tech landscape.

    HrmTo is an innovative cloud-based Human Resource Management System (HRMS) that offers a comprehensive suite of HR solutions to streamline HR processes, automate HR tasks, and improve HR efficiency. HrmTo is designed to meet the evolving needs of modern HR departments and provides a user-friendly interface with robust features that cater to businesses of all sizes and industries.  
      
    1.Employee Database Management  
    2.Employee Self-Service (ESS)  
    3.Payroll and Compensation Management:  
    4.Time and Attendance Tracking  
    5.Benefits Administration  
    6.Performance Management  
    7.Recruiting and Onboarding  
    8.Training and Development  
    9.Reporting and Analytics  
    10.Compliance and Document Management  
    11.Employee Communication and Engagement  
    12.Integration and Customization  
      
    In conclusion, HrmTo is a comprehensive HRMS that offers a wide range of features to streamline HR processes, automate HR tasks, and improve HR efficiency. With its user-friendly interface, cloud-based accessibility, and robust features, HrmTo is an ideal solution for businesses looking to streamline their HR operations and enhance their overall HR management. ## About

As the Founder and CEO of Whuups Inc., a trailblazing social media platform, they lead the charge in redefining global digital interactions. The platform offers subscription-free, AI-powered tools to foster social connections without language barriers, aligning with their mission to create an inclusive and customizable user experience. They have championed innovation in social networking, driving user engagement through real-time communication and robust event creation features.  
  
With over five years of entrepreneurial expertise, they have consistently demonstrated a commitment to leveraging advanced technology and creative solutions to enhance connectivity. Their leadership at Whuups is defined by a focus on scalability and inclusivity, positioning the company as a leader in global social interaction while enabling sustained growth and expansion.

His content and experience center around recruiting industry challenges, hiring top performers, and scaling search firms - not support operations, IT teams, customer success, or ticket management systems. No evidence of managing support workflows, knowledge management for service desks, or the operational chaos described in the target ICP. Company context and pain points are misaligned with ResolveOnce's target market.

*   [
    
    ### Pasquale Scopelliti
    
    “I wish I remembered how I met Jon. I do recall it was in 2001…or so. But, what I can tell you with absolute certainty is that if you want inspiration, if you want to see how “it” is supposed to be done…then you need to meet Jon Bartos by any means you can. Yes, he’s one of the top recruiters in the world, and so if you’re considering using his recruiting services all I can ask is what are you waiting for? Yes, he’s one of the top speakers and motivators in the recruiting industry, although of course his sales and performance messages are utterly universal. Yes, he’s attained the heights (literally) of being one of America’s most winning pole-vaulters and obviously knows how to set goals and hit them with his entire body. Perhaps it is that hitting goals thing that I can give my greatest testament to. Not only does Jon know how to set and hit goals – and he’s written important books on the topic – he is surely at the pinnacle of numerical goal setting and tracking of performance numbers in every conceivable way. Yep, that’s the one thing I’ll stand behind the most in my recommendation for Jon. When he speaks about performance, performance numbers, setting, tracking and hitting goals, you’d simply have to be a fool to fail to listen. I am honored to give my unqualified recommendation to Jon, and honored to count him friend and ally.”

His profile emphasizes CRM implementations, AI automation, and technical consulting, with no evidence of managing support operations, IT teams, or customer success functions. The company appears to be a technology consultancy/SaaS provider rather than a team struggling with ticket resolution, agent turnover, or operational chaos in support/IT/customer success. His role is strategic and technical, not operational management of support teams.

    ### Marc Benioff

    The Agentic Enterprise is driving profound change across every industry, but nowhere are the stakes higher than in healthcare. There is an incredible opportunity to elevate the work of healthcare professionals and deliver stronger care for patients around the world. In an essay for TIME, Murali Doraiswamy, professor of medicine at Duke University, and I discuss how AI is revolutionizing medicine, including: • Flagging subtle abnormalities in scans and slides that a human eye might miss. • Speeding up the discovery of drugs and drug targets. • Providing patients faster and more personalized support, from scheduling to flagging side effects But we’ve also seen that over-reliance on AI can lead to “deskilling” — in which medical professionals become less effective. That underscores the importance of approaches that keep humans at the center, such as the Intelligent Choice Architecture (ICA), where AI systems don’t make decisions but nudge providers to take a second look at results, weigh alternatives, and stay actively engaged in the process. The future of work is humans and AI agents working together. If we commit to designing systems that sharpen our abilities, we can combine the promise of AI with the critical thinking, compassion, and real-world judgment that only humans bring. name: Natalie Furness - Revenue Operations
classification_reason: Profile shows Natalie is Founder/CEO of RevOps Automated, a revenue operations consulting/service provider focused on CRM implementation, sales/marketing automation, and revenue systems optimization for B2B/SaaS clients. Her expertise and content center on sales enablement, marketing automation, and revenue process optimization - not support operations, IT teams, or customer service ticket management. While she has decision-making authority as founder, her operational focus is on revenue/sales processes rather than the support ticket resolution, agent turnover, and knowledge management challenges described in the target ICP. Her company appears to be a service provider rather than an organization with internal support teams experiencing the specified pain points.

The individual's focus is on AI product development and technical leadership, not operational support management.

*   ### Top SXSW Influencer
    
    #### Hill+Knowlton Strategies
    
    Mar 2017
    
    Over the nine-day festival, there were almost one million mentions of the keyword ‘SXSW’ online, which provided the impetus to use H+K’s proprietary influencer mapping methodology, Sherlock+, to work out which mentions were most impactful.  
      
    Working with Brandwatch, we wrote a bespoke “query” for SXSW mentions. Queries are extended search strings written in Boolean syntax which determine what sort of information Sherlock+ pulls in from the web to analyze.  
      
    In this case, the query was… Show more
    
    Over the nine-day festival, there were almost one million mentions of the keyword ‘SXSW’ online, which provided the impetus to use H+K’s proprietary influencer mapping methodology, Sherlock+, to work out which mentions were most impactful.  
      
    Working with Brandwatch, we wrote a bespoke “query” for SXSW mentions. Queries are extended search strings written in Boolean syntax which determine what sort of information Sherlock+ pulls in from the web to analyze.  
      
    In this case, the query was based on associated language, hashtags, and names of people on featured speakers lists. This query was then used to populate a dashboard, built to identify the follow features of any conversation:  
      
    Influencers  
    Topics of conversation  
    Media, forums and blogs.  
      
    For this particular set-up, we focused on influencers and topics.  
      
    One of the biggest influencers identified during the festival was Sandy Carter, formerly IBM’s General Manager of Ecosystem Development and Social Business. Carter conducted her own research and found out that “innovate” was the word of the festival, both on the ground and then online. She explained that the word was used 650,000 times over the first weekend of the festival alone, which breaks down to a rate of 8.2 mentions a second on average. While these mentions can’t all be linked to SXSW conversation, many of them were.  
      
    Carter herself hosted a session on artificial intelligence and bots at the festival this year. One of the most notable pieces of advice she gave for brands was that “bots are more memorable than apps”, offering a stronger, deeper way to reflect your brand and engage with consumers more efficiently. Show less

*   ### Rapid Application Prototyper
    
    #### Sep 2012
    
    Web application development is one of the growing domains for IT industries. Many IT companies are moving forward for agile development strategy for building their web applications. Though there are various web application development frameworks available on internet, most of the frameworks do not adapt agile development strategy and also lack standard web application design architecture. So, many customers come up with the ideas but developers or business analyst from IT industries doesn’t… Show more
    
    Web application development is one of the growing domains for IT industries. Many IT companies are moving forward for agile development strategy for building their web applications. Though there are various web application development frameworks available on internet, most of the frameworks do not adapt agile development strategy and also lack standard web application design architecture. So, many customers come up with the ideas but developers or business analyst from IT industries doesn’t have any framework by which they can have a quick (agile) prototype of the idea.  
    The proposed system decided to design framework by which developers can develop web application from scratch within a very quick time. Proposed framework will perform application bootstrapping by using MVC (Model View Controller) approach which is standard web application design architecture. Idea of customer is transformed into class diagram which will be an input to the framework. The framework provides various drag and drop UI components which will be used for designing interactive web pages. The framework comes up with the new feature called as injection point which will let you add your own widgets. Injection point is a facility to customize the framework according to the needs of customer. Thus, the proposed framework provides a quick prototype by using combination of standard software architectural patterns MDA (Model Driven Architecture) and MVC. Show less
